description:
The peace of fair Alefgard has been shattered by the appearance of the nefarious master of the night known as
the Dragonlord, and the Sphere of Light, which for so long kept the forces of darkness in check, has been stolen!
It is time for you, a young warrior through whose veins flows the blood of the legendary hero Erdrick, to set out
on a quest to vanquish the Dragonlord, and save the land from darkness!

V0.1.0.description:
# Initial Release!

## Overview
**Note:** Only tested on Windows, Linux *might* work but try at your own risk.
For more information and future ideas, check out the [README](https://github.com/Serpikmin/Archipelago-DragonWarrior/blob/main/README.md), but TLDR:
- 31 Location checks currently (All chests)
- Quest items shuffled through multiworld (Erdrick's Token + Rainbow Drop at vanilla locations for now)
- Magic Key vendors disabled, instead, find an unbreakable Magic Key as a progression item!
- Some underlying improvements to the game as a result of [DWRandomizer](https://dwrandomizer.com/) (credit to [mcgrew](https://github.com/mcgrew/dwrandomizer) and [juef](https://github.com/juef17/dwrandomizer)!), more to come soon through YAML options!

I don't expect there to be any major bugs with this release due to the simplicity of the game, but if you run into something, let @serpikmin know on Discord, preferably in the Dragon Warrior 1 thread within future-game-design.

## Generating
Install the `.apworld` file as you would any other, and edit the `Dragon_Warrior.yaml` file with your player name (no other game-specific options for now). After generating, be sure to send your Dragon Warrior player the `.apdw` patch file so they can play.

## Joining
As above, your host should send you the `.apdw` patch file. Be sure to open this using the "Open Patch" button in the Archipelago Launcher, simply double-clicking the file will result in an error. You will be prompted for your legally dumped `.nes` ROM of Dragon Warrior the first time, as well as your [Bizhawk Emulator](https://tasvideos.org/Bizhawk) installation. Once the client opens, be sure the URL and port at the top are accurate, hit connect, then type your player name (slot) and enjoy!
V0.1.0.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.1.0

V0.1.1.description: This update should fix an issue with generating the patched ROM depending on the name of the `.apdw` patch file.
V0.1.1.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.1.1

V0.2.0.description:
# Options and Level Checks

## New:
- Introducing game specific options, going from 0 -> 51!
  - A majority of options from DWR are directly imported, most of the missing ones are map or goal related which I will attempt to reconcile at a later time
- Level-ups from 2 - 20 are now checks, bringing the total check count from 31 -> 50!
  - Logic assumes you will have access to the Magic Key for Levels 11 - 20 to not make the early game too grind-heavy
- Filler inventory items have been removed for now, instead you will only receive Herbs and Gold as filler
- Support for the PRG0 version of the ROM should be added, but I cannot test this so let me know if it functions properly

## Fixes
- The Staff of Rain shrine guy will no longer turn you away if you already have the Staff of Rain to prevent possible softlocks
- The Magic Key can no longer be sold

## Known Issues
- Minimal accessibility logic may generate unbeatable seeds, please set accessibility to full for now
- I cannot test all combinations of options on my own, so if you run into something unexpected please post it in the Dragon Warrior thread in the AP Discord
V0.2.0.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.2.0

V0.2.1.description: This fixes a small region issue with accessibility.
V0.2.1.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.2.1

V0.2.2.description:
## Fixes
- Fixed Death Necklace and Fighter's Ring not working properly (Generation)
- Skipping level-ups will now send checks for the missed levels (Client)

## Known Issues
- Minimal Accessibility is still broken
- Will add YAML options soon to disable Levelsanity and customize which levels are included
- The Fighter's Ring is not placed in the item pool
V0.2.2.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.2.2

V0.3.0.description:
# Search Spots

## New
- The three item search spots are now added to the location/item pool (Erdrick's Armour, Erdrick's Token, Fairy Flute)
  - As a result, Erdrick's Token is now a required AP Item to beat the game alongside the Staff of Rain and Stones of Sunlight
- Added Levelsanity toggle and Levelsanity Range (2 - 30) to YAML options to configure how many level-ups are location checks

## Fixes
- The Fighter's Ring is now in the item pool (for real this time)
- Magic Herbs YAML option should be fixed
V0.3.0.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.3.0

V0.3.1.description: - This release should fix minimal accessibility
V0.3.1.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.3.1

V0.4.0.description:
# Shopsanity

## New
- Added ShopSanity YAML option
  - Adds 13 checks for buying each individual piece of equipment from shops
  - Also adds progressive weapons, armors, and shields and factors these into logic (removes Erd. Sword and Armor, as these are the final progressive upgrades)
  - **NOTE:** You cannot currently see what item you are buying in place of the equipment, I plan to add client hints for shop items in the next update.
- Added SearchSanity YAML option
  - If you want to remove the 3 checks at the Search Spots, now you can!
- Added Rainbow Drop and Ball of Light (Victory) as APItems, forced in their local locations for cleaner logging purposes.

## Fixed
- Fixed losing received items if you haven't created a save file yet.

## Known Issues
- Sometimes damage number displays in battle overflow to 256+ (I haven't figured out why this happens yet but it doesn't impact gameplay)

## Needs Testing
- Combinations of -Sanity options to make sure they all play nice together
V0.4.0.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.4.0

V0.4.1.description:
- Fixed an issue where only 6 progressive weapons/armors were generating with shopsanity instead of 7
- Fixed a generation issue where there would be more filler items than locations
- Potentially fixed a Linux ROM patching issue
V0.4.1.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.4.1

V0.4.2.description:
- Temporary fix for a logic bug where Quest Items could get placed in the Dragonlord's Lair (spoiler log a bit borked as a result)
- Fix for client crash when received gold (and herbs) would overflow
- Enabling Shopsanity now forces the randomized equipment shops option to be off

Note that this is a bit of an emergency update to solve the logic bug so I have not been able to extensively test the changes, but there shouldn't be any major issues introduced.
V0.4.2.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.4.2

V0.5.0.description:
## New 
- With Shopsanity enabled, walking into a town now creates AP hints for the shop equipment checks, so you know what you're buying.
- 2 new checks for rescuing Princess Gwaelin and returning her to Tantegel, credit and thanks to @Quinian for implementing!
- Also courtesy of @Quinian, check out the [Poptracker pack](https://github.com/Quinian/Dragon-Warrior-Poptracker)!


## Fixed
- Quest items should no longer be placed in Charlock (for real this time)
- Slight tweaks to some item/location names and classification

## Known Issues
- With Shopsanity on, you may randomly get the check for purchasing one of the shields while fighting an enemy
- Damage numbers in combat occasionally display wrong, actual gameplay numbers are unaffected
- Some randomized options may have their values changed when re-opening the patch file
V0.5.0.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v0.5.0

V1.0.0.description:
# Feature Complete Release!
With this I consider this APWorld feature complete! Any updates from here will be squashing any bugs that might pop up. At some point I'd like to get this core-verified but no timeline for now.
## New
- **Monstersanity:** Killing a monster for the first time sends out a check, adds 40 locations and filler items.
- **DeathLink:** With a customized death message telling all your friends what killed you.
- **New DWR Options:** `random_map`, `random_map_size`, `run_mechanics`, and `bonk_damage` have been added.
  - Note: There's a chance a few softlocks might have slipped by me with the `random_map` option, be sure your host is able to send you the Magic Key manually in the worst-case scenario!

## Fixed
- Your slot name is now written to the patched ROM, no need to manually enter it in the client anymore.
- The `.apdw` patch file can now finally be double-clicked to patch the ROM (this was a one-line fix...)
- -sanity options are now written to slot data for automatic Poptracker usage (once it's updated)
- Fixed re-opening the patch file causing the ROM to be re-patched, breaking some randomized options.
- Fixed shield purchase checks sometimes being sent after a battle ends with shopsanity enabled.
- Fixed damage numbers sometimes being wildly inaccurate in battle.
- Added proper `archipelago.json` file to future-proof for AP 0.7.0

Thanks for everyone who's played, provided feedback, and reported bugs :)
PS: Play Dragon Quest 1+2 HD-2D Remake coming out October 30th
V1.0.0.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v1.0.0

V1.0.1.description:
- Fixed client crash upon entering a town with Shopsanity disabled
- Fixed logic error for Cantlin's purchase checks on Shopsanity not being gated by the Magic Key
- Updated item receiving logic so filler items are properly dropped first
V1.0.1.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v1.0.1

V1.0.2.description: Added support for Python 3.13 (for AP 0.6.5) and Python 3.14 (for future-proofing)
V1.0.2.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v1.0.2

V1.0.3.description:
- Fixed a few logic issues with Magic Key placement
- Useful items are now properly classified as Useful
- Fix client error on updated versions
- Removed support for Python 3.12
V1.0.3.title: Dragon Warrior APWorld v1.0.3
